# Advanced Topics

> Documentation for Advanced Topics.

## Subtopics

- [Expression Trees](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/advanced-topics/expression-trees/llms.txt): Topics available: 9; Expression Trees documentation and reference.
- [Interface Implementation Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/advanced-topics/interface-implementation/llms.txt): Topics available: 3; Interface Implementation Docs documentation and reference.
- [Interoperability Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/advanced-topics/interop/llms.txt): Topics available: 9; Interoperability Overview documentation and reference.
- [Avoid memory allocations and data copies](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/advanced-topics/performance/llms.txt): Topics available: 3; Avoid memory allocations and data copies documentation and reference.
- [Attributes and reflection](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/advanced-topics/reflection-and-attributes/llms.txt): Topics available: 8; Attributes and reflection documentation and reference.
